All Classes

Class
Description
AudioUtils
 
Board
The game board panel containing cells.
BorderCenterPanel
This class allow to center the content of a panel in a border layout.
Cell
Represents a cell on the game board.
CenterPanelTopBar
Represents the top bar of the center panel in the game board.
ChoosePlayers
The ChoosePlayers class represents the panel for choosing player names.
CustomizedButton
A button with a customized appearance.
CustomizedTextField
A text field with a customized appearance.
DialogPanel
A custom JPanel class that represents a dialog panel.
DimensionUtils
The DimensionUtils class provides utility methods for managing dimensions and sizes in the application.
EasyAIPlayer
The EasyAIPlayer class implements a simple AI player for the Quarto game.
EventsHandler
A custom class that handles events for the main frame.
ExitButton
A button used for exiting an application.
Field
A customizable field component.
FormatUtils
This class contains all the methods used to format the data.
GameBoard
Represents the game board.
GameOverDialog
Represents the dialog displayed when the game is over.
GameStatusHandler
 
GameStatusListener
The GameStatusListener interface provides a contract for classes that need to be notified when the game status is updated.
GoBackButton
A button used for navigating back to the previous page.
GridCenterPanel
A panel that centers its content in a 3x3 grid layout.
Heuristics
The Heuristics class defines the evaluation parameters for the AI in the Quarto game.
HintButton
Represents a button for giving a hint.
HistoryButton
Represents a button used for displaying the game history.
ImageLibrary
This class contains all images used in the application.
ImageThemed
A wrapper class for themed images.
ImageUtils
A utility class for handling image-related operations.
LanguageButton
A button to switch between languages.
LanguageChangeListener
An interface for objects that listen for changes in language and need to update text accordingly.
LangUtils
The LangUtils class provides utility methods for language-related operations.
LeftPanelTopBar
Represents the top bar on the left side of the game board.
LoadHelper
Helper class for creating and rendering slots in the LoadPage.
LoadPage
JPanel representing the load page, where users can load saved game slots.
Main
The main class of the Quarto game application.
MainFrame
The main frame of the Quarto game application.
MainMenu
The MainMenu class represents the main menu of the game application.
ManualButton
A button to open the manual or rules page.
MediumAIPlayer
The MediumAIPlayer class represents an AI player for the Quarto game.
MiniMaxAIPlayer
The MiniMaxAIPlayer class represents an AI player that uses the MiniMax algorithm with alpha-beta pruning to select the best pawn and play the best move in a game of Quarto.
Move
Represents a move in the game history.
MovePanel
Represents a panel displaying a move with an icon.
MovesHistory
Represents a scrollable panel displaying the moves history.
MovesHistoryDialog
Represents a dialog panel for displaying the moves history.
MusicButton
A custom JButton component for toggling music on and off.
PauseButton
Represents a button used to pause the game.
PauseDialogContent
Represents the content of the pause dialog.
PauseMenuButton
Represents a button used to open the pause menu.
Pawn
A graphical representation of a pawn on the game board.
PawnsBar
Represents the panel that displays the available pawns.
PawnsBarSlot
Represents a slot in the pawns bar.
PawnUtils
This class contains all the pawns used in the game.
Player
An interface representing a player in the Quarto game.
PlayerFields
The PlayerFields class represents a component containing the fields to set up a player.
QuartoBoard
The QuartoBoard class represents the game board for a game of Quarto.
QuartoFile
The QuartoFile class represents the file management system for saving and loading game states.
QuartoHistory
The QuartoHistory class represents a historical record of moves in the Quarto game.
QuartoModel
The QuartoModel class represents the model component of the Quarto game application.
QuartoPawn
The QuartoPawn class represents a pawn in the game of Quarto.
QuartoPlayerManager
The QuartoPlayerManager class manages the players in a game of Quarto.
QuartoWin
The QuartoWin class represents the winning conditions and lines in a game of Quarto.
RandomAIPlayer
An AI player that selects moves randomly in the Quarto game.
RedoButton
Represents a button for redoing an action.
ResumeButton
Represents a button for resuming the game.
RightPanelTopBar
Represents the top bar on the right side of the game board.
RoundBorder
A custom border with rounded corners.
RulesPage
The RulesPage class represents a panel displaying rules or information about the game.
SavePage
JPanel representing the save page, where users can save a game in a slot.
SlotFile
Represents a slot file with an ID, filename, and last modified timestamp.
SlotManager
The SlotManager class manages the slot files used for saving and loading game states.
SnackbarPanel
A panel to display snackbar messages at the bottom of a frame.
ThemeButton
A button to toggle between light and dark themes.
ThemeListener
An interface for objects that listen for changes in the application's theme and need to update accordingly.
ThemeUtils
This class allow to change the theme of the application.
TopBarGameBoard
Represents the top bar of the game board.
TopBarMainMenu
The TopBarMainMenu class represents the top bar of the main menu, containing buttons for music control, theme change, language change, opening the manual, and exiting the application.
TranslatedButton
A button with translated text.
TranslatedLabel
A label with translated text.
TranslatedString
The TranslatedString class represents a string that can be translated to different languages.
UndoButton
Represents a button for undoing the last action.
ViewModelController
The ViewModelController class serves as the controller in the Model-View-Controller (MVC) architecture for managing the game state and interactions between the game model and the user interface.
ViewModelListener
An interface for objects that listen for changes in the ViewModel and need to update accordingly.
